name: Heli Pilot Pursuit Moto Bike
description: Get ready for the most amazing fun in this bike and police hali racing and enjoy the bike stunts on tricky impossible tracks. If you successful to bike running fast and win the race to heli then your mission complete otherwise colliding with obstacle,ramps or lose race then your level failed. Game control is so easy try again and again make you master of this game. Multiple levels and bikes make you enjoyment for long time. So if you think you are a best stuntman then lets come and show your skill.
